content.text: Hello, I like to watch japanese cartoons anime in my free time.
Hello, I design video games for a living.
That's cool. I also like to play video games.
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
I've heard good things about that game. I've never played it, but I've seen some gameplay videos. It looks really cool.
It is. It's one of the best open-world games I've ever played.
I'm not really a fan of open-world games. I prefer games that have a more linear story.
I can understand that. Open-world games can be a little overwhelming sometimes.
Yeah, they can be. But I do like the freedom to explore and do whatever you want.
That's one of the things I love about open-world games. You can just wander around and see what you can find.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, go to concerts, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do a lot of the same things.
Cool. We should hang out sometime.
Great. I'll PM you my number.
